tool_description:
PagePixels provides free screenshots, scheduled screenshots, multi-step screenshots (complete forms, login to websites, etc) and built-in deliveries to services such as Slack, Dropbox, and Webhooks.  We make it easy to keep your dashboards, status pages, and employees up-to-date with the latest information from around the web.

PagePixels also empowers your team to keep track of changes.  Each configuration can be configured with an unlimited number of change notifications, allowing you to ke...
name: PagePixels Screenshots
title: PagePixels Screenshots

api_list.name: /snap
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a screenshot immediately. By default it returns the requested image. If the json argument is set to true, it will return a json object containing the direct link and the thumbnail link to the image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pagepixels-screenshots.p.rapidapi.com/snap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pagepixels-screenshots.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /screenshot_configs/{id}/capture
api_list.description: The capture endpoint takes immediately starts capturing another screenshot with the referenced screenshot configuration, regardless of the scheduled interval. This will not interrupt scheduled screenshots for this configuration.

api_list.name: /screenshot_configs
api_list.description: This endpoint creates a new screenshot configuration, which can be configured with a scheduler to take screenshots on a recurring schedule. Change Notifications and Multi-Step Screenshots can also be configured. Please see the Screenshot API Documentation for more information. All screenshots are archived in Your Account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pagepixels-screenshots.p.rapidapi.com/screenshot_configs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pagepixels-screenshots.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
